author: Prabalika M. Borah
title: COVID-19: During lockdown, stay fit at home with a little push from workout buddies
description: An unexpected yet welcome result of the lockdown, the fitness community is reaching out to those who need a little motivation to stay fit during the Coronavirus pandemic
content: I am demotivated, said one friend to the other. I need to get back on my yoga mat and start. I cannot do it at home alone, she continued. The following day, the friend promptly made a WhatsApp video call, dressed in her yoga pants and set to start a surya nam… [+3123 chars]
